duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the planning and implementation of new sidewalks construction projects in accordance with city regulations and safety standards.
Manage a team of construction professionals, coordinating their efforts to achieve project timelines and quality standards.
Develop and maintain relationships with city officials, stakeholders, and contractors to ensure successful project delivery.
Collaborate with engineering and design teams to create and review sidewalk construction plans and specifications.
Monitor project budgets, resources, and risks, and take proactive measures to address any issues that may arise.
Ensure compliance with environmental and regulatory requirements related to sidewalk construction projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
